plot: Three bumbling gas station attendants are mistaken for college professors arriving from Germany to teach at a prestigious women's college.
title: Violent Is the Word for Curly
plot_es: Three bumbling gas station attendants are mistaken for college professors arriving from Germany to teach at a prestigious women's college.
original_name: Violent Is the Word for Curly
plot_en: Three bumbling gas station attendants are mistaken for college professors arriving from Germany to teach at a prestigious women's college.
